title: Set Up Utility Account for Vacant Unit
description: Between tenants, a property manager must transfer the electric utility account for a unit into the management company's name.

tasks.description: Contact the electric utility company to report a change in occupancy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The utility company is notified of the tenant move-out.

tasks.description: Provide the utility company with the management company's information to establish service.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new account is created for the management company.

tasks.description: Confirm that the utility service has been successfully transferred and the account is active.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives confirmation of the new active account.
